getNFTCollectionPrice(address).details: Gets the default price for an NFT collection.

params.nftContract: is the address of the NFT contract

returns.price: of the Token in weis of dollars. 10^18 => $ 1.00 USD

getNFTPrice(address,uint256).details: Gets the price for an NFT. It will return the NFT's specific price, or the price of the collection if no specific price has been given.

params.nftContract: is the address of the NFT contract

returns.price: of the Token in weis of dollars. 10^18 => $ 1.00 USD
